title:
To NCDOT:  Why is east-bound I-140, beyond I-40 interchange, not continued to Market Street overpass, near Porter\'s Neck?  Seems roadway is same quality as west of I-40.



Would be nice to have exit near new Lowes designated as \Exit 62.\" "
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9164
